main event: A civilian observed a bright silver cigar-shaped object moving to the north in New Orleans on 7 July 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed from a car for approximately 3 minutes.,The observer initially thought it might be the reflection from an airplane.,The object had a bright silver color and was larger than a transport plane.,The object appeared to climb slowly as it moved north.,The weather conditions were clear with no clouds present.
witness description: Insurance salesman with hobbies in studying birds
